execution_quality: Well-executed with systematic file location and content comparison. Agent provided clear structure showing differences between versions, though one error occurred during execution.
work_category: Grammar comparison task between two versions of a specification file. Agent located files, examined their contents, and provided a detailed diff-based comparison of the grammar rules.
summary: Agent successfully analyzed and compared two grammar versions as requested, identifying key differences in structure and rules. The work was straightforward and methodical, though there was one execution error that was handled. User moved directly to implementation planning, suggesting the comparison provided sufficient information, though the alignment could have been slightly higher if the agent had proactively highlighted the most significant differences more prominently.
follow_up_pattern: User is proceeding directly to next phase (implementation) rather than asking for clarification, suggesting the comparison was adequate.
